TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Stopwatch extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一组方法和属性，可用于准确地测量运行时间。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that you can use to accurately measure elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A实例可以测量运行时间一个时间间隔，或所用时间的总跨多个时间间隔。A instance can measure elapsed time for one interval, or the total of elapsed time across multiple intervals. 在典型方案中，调用方法，然后最终调用方法，然后检查正在使用的运行时间属性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. A实例处于运行或停止; 使用来确定的当前状态。A instance is either running or stopped; use to determine the current state of a . 使用开始测量运行时间; 使用停止测量运行时间。Use to begin measuring elapsed time; use to stop measuring elapsed time. 查询通过属性的运行时间值， ，或。Query the elapsed time value through the properties , , or . 运行还是已停止实例时，可以查询运行时间属性。You can query the elapsed time properties while the instance is running or stopped. 属性稳定增加的已用时间而是运行; 它们保持不变停止实例时。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下，运行时间值的实例等于所有测量的时间间隔的总数。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用开始计数累积的运行时间; 每次调用结束当前的时间间隔测量，并会冻结的累计运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法来清除中现有的累计已用时间实例。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. 测量运行时间由计数计时器刻度表示基础计时器机制中的。The measures elapsed time by counting timer ticks in the underlying timer mechanism. 如果已安装的硬件和操作系统支持的高分辨率性能计数器，则类使用该计数器来测量运行时间。If the installed hardware and operating system support a high-resolution performance counter, then the class uses that counter to measure elapsed time. 否则为类使用系统计时器来测量运行时间。Otherwise, the class uses the system timer to measure elapsed time. 使用和字段，以确定的精度和解决方法计时实现。Use the and fields to determine the precision and resolution of the timing implementation. 类可帮助在托管代码中与计时相关的性能计数器的操作。The class assists the manipulation of timing-related performance counters within managed code. 具体而言，字段和方法可用来代替非托管的 Win32 Api`QueryPerformanceFrequency`和`QueryPerformanceCounter`。Specifically, the field and method can be used in place of the unmanaged Win32 APIs `QueryPerformanceFrequency` and `QueryPerformanceCounter`. > [!NOTE] > 在多处理器计算机上，它并不重要哪个处理器运行的线程。On a multiprocessor computer, it does not matter which processor the thread runs on. 但是，由于在 BIOS 或硬件抽象层 (HAL) 中的 bug，你可以在不同的处理器获得不同的计时结果的注意事项。However, because of bugs in the BIOS or the Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL), you can get different timing results on different processors. 若要指定线程的处理器关联，请使用方法。To specify processor affinity for a thread, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类，以确定应用程序的执行时间。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to determine the execution time for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示了利用类来计算性能数据。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to calculate performance data. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回实例已停止，然后实例的运行时间属性为零。The returned instance is stopped, and the elapsed time property of the instance is zero. 使用方法，以开始测量运行时间与新实例。Use the method to begin measuring elapsed time with the new instance. 使用方法以初始化新实例，并立即启动它。Use the method to initialize a new instance and immediately start it. ## Examples 下面的示例初始化通过使用简单的类构造函数的实例。The following example initializes a instance by using a simple class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Elapsed As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan Elapsed { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前实例测量得出的总运行时间。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.

value.span: 一个只读的 ，表示当前实例测量得出的总运行时间。

span.span: A read-only representing the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型方案中，调用方法，然后最终调用方法，然后检查正在使用的运行时间属性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 使用属性，以检索经过的时间值使用方法和属性。Use the property to retrieve the elapsed time value using methods and properties. 例如，你可以设置的格式返回实例为文本表示形式，或将其传递给需要的另一个类参数。For example, you can format the returned instance into a text representation, or pass it to another class that requires a parameter. 您可以查询属性， ，和时实例处于运行或停止。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 属性稳定增加的已用时间而是运行; 它们保持不变停止实例时。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下，运行时间值的实例等于所有测量的时间间隔的总数。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用开始计数累积的运行时间; 每次调用结束当前的时间间隔测量，并会冻结的累计运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法来清除中现有的累计已用时间实例。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定应用程序的执行时间。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the execution time for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ElapsedMilliseconds As Long
public: property long ElapsedMilliseconds { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前实例测量得出的总运行时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in milliseconds.

value.span: 一个只读长整型，表示当前实例测量得出的总毫秒数。

span.span: A read-only long integer representing the total number of milliseconds measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示运行时间向下舍入为最接近的整数毫秒值。This property represents elapsed time rounded down to the nearest whole millisecond value. 对于更高的精度测量，使用或属性。For higher precision measurements, use the or properties. 您可以查询属性， ，和时实例处于运行或停止。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 属性稳定增加的已用时间而是运行; 它们保持不变停止实例时。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下，运行时间值的实例等于所有测量的时间间隔的总数。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用开始计数累积的运行时间; 每次调用结束当前的时间间隔测量，并会冻结的累计运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法来清除中现有的累计已用时间实例。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类，用于测量的性能的四个不同实现的分析从字符串的整数。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ElapsedTicks As Long
public: property long ElapsedTicks { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前实例测量得出的总运行时间（用计时器刻度表示）。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in timer ticks.

value.span: 一个只读长整型，表示当前实例测量得出的计时器刻度总数。

span.span: A read-only long integer representing the total number of timer ticks measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示基础计时器机制中的已用计时周期数。This property represents the number of elapsed ticks in the underlying timer mechanism. 计时周期是最小时间单位，计时器可以测量。A tick is the smallest unit of time that the timer can measure. 使用要转换的字段值转换为的秒数。Use the field to convert the value into a number of seconds. 您可以查询属性， ，和时实例处于运行或停止。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 属性稳定增加的已用时间而是运行; 它们保持不变停止实例时。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 默认情况下，运行时间值的实例等于所有测量的时间间隔的总数。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次调用开始计数累积的运行时间; 每次调用结束当前的时间间隔测量，并会冻结的累计运行时间值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法来清除中现有的累计已用时间实例。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. > [!NOTE] > 刻度是不同于。 ticks are different from . 在每个刻度值表示一个 100 纳秒时间间隔。Each tick in the value represents one 100-nanosecond interval. 在每个刻度值表示的时间间隔等于 1 秒除以。Each tick in the value represents the time interval equal to 1 second divided by the . ## Examples 下面的示例使用类，用于测量的性能的四个不同实现的分析从字符串的整数。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Frequency As Long

summary.span: 获取以每秒刻度数表示的计时器频率。

span.span: Gets the frequency of the timer as the number of ticks per second.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计时器精度和分辨率，该值指示的计时器频率。The timer frequency indicates the timer precision and resolution. 例如，计时器频率为 200 万个刻度每第二个等于每个时钟周期的 500 毫微秒的计时器分辨率。For example, a timer frequency of 2 million ticks per second equals a timer resolution of 500 nanoseconds per tick. 换而言之，由于一秒等于 1 亿毫微秒为单位，每秒 200 万个计时周期的计时器频率相当于每 10 亿毫微秒，可以进一步简化为 1 个刻度每 500 毫微秒的 200 万个刻度。In other words, because one second equals 1 billion nanoseconds, a timer frequency of 2 million ticks per second is equivalent to 2 million ticks per 1 billion nanoseconds, which can be further simplified to 1 tick per 500 nanoseconds. 值取决于基础的计时机制的分辨率。The value depends on the resolution of the underlying timing mechanism. 如果已安装的硬件和操作系统支持的高分辨率性能计数器，则值反映该计数器的频率。If the installed hardware and operating system support a high-resolution performance counter, then the value reflects the frequency of that counter. 否则为值基于系统计时器频率。Otherwise, the value is based on the system timer frequency. 因为频率取决于安装的硬件和操作系统，系统运行时，值保持不变。Because the frequency depends on the installed hardware and operating system, the value remains constant while the system is running. ## Examples 下面的示例显示的频率和解决方法计时器。The following example displays the frequency and resolution of a timer. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int64 GetTimestamp() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetTimestamp () As Long

summary.span: 获取计时器机制中的当前刻度数。

span.span: Gets the current number of ticks in the timer mechanism.

returns.span: 一个长整型，表示基础计时器机制中的刻度计数器值。

span.span: A long integer representing the tick counter value of the underlying timer mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类使用的高分辨率性能计数器，返回该计数器的当前值。If the class uses a high-resolution performance counter, returns the current value of that counter. 如果类使用系统计时器，返回当前属性实例。If the class uses the system timer, returns the current property of the instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来更新性能计数器。The following example illustrates the use of the method to update a performance counter. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CPP/elapsedtime.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CS/elapsedtime.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/VB/elapsedtime.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IsHighResolution As Boolean

summary.span: 指示计时器是否基于高分辨率性能计数器。

span.span: Indicates whether the timer is based on a high-resolution performance counter.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用计时器类取决于系统硬件和操作系统。The timer used by the class depends on the system hardware and operating system. 是`true`如果计时器是否基于高分辨率性能计数器。 is `true` if the timer is based on a high-resolution performance counter. 否则为是`false`，这指示计时器是否基于系统计时器。Otherwise, is `false`, which indicates that the timer is based on the system timer. ## Examples 下面的示例显示的频率和解决方法计时器。The following example displays the frequency and resolution of a timer. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRunning As Boolean
public: property bool IsRunning { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示 计时器是否在运行的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the timer is running.

value.span: 如果 实例当前正在运行，并且在对某个时间间隔的运行时间进行测量，则该值为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance is currently running and measuring elapsed time for an interval; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A实例开始运行，而调用或。A instance begins running with a call to or . 通过调用运行该实例会停止或。The instance stops running with a call to or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 停止时间间隔测量，并将运行时间重置为零。

span.span: Stops time interval measurement and resets the elapsed time to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A实例计算，并跨多个时间间隔，保留的累积的运行时间，直到重置实例。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset. 使用停止当前的时间间隔测量和保留的累计运行时间值。Use to stop the current interval measurement and retain the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用若要停止正在进行的任何时间间隔测量，并清除运行时间值。Use to stop any interval measurement in progress and clear the elapsed time value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Restart() cil managed

summary.span: 停止时间间隔测量，将运行时间重置为零，然后开始测量运行时间。

span.span: Stops time interval measurement, resets the elapsed time to zero, and starts measuring elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A实例计算，并跨多个时间间隔，保留的累积的运行时间，直到重置或重新启动实例。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset or restarted. 使用停止当前的时间间隔测量和保留的累计运行时间值。Use to stop the current interval measurement and retain the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用若要停止正在进行的任何时间间隔测量，并清除运行时间值。Use to stop any interval measurement in progress and clear the elapsed time value. 使用来停止当前间隔测量和启动新的时间间隔测量。Use to stop current interval measurement and start a new interval measurement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start() cil managed

summary.span: 开始或继续测量某个时间间隔的运行时间。

span.span: Starts, or resumes, measuring elapsed time for an interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型方案中，调用方法，然后最终调用方法，然后检查正在使用的运行时间属性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 启动后，计时器测量当前时间间隔，用已用的计时器刻度表示，直到在实例处于停止或重置。Once started, a timer measures the current interval, in elapsed timer ticks, until the instance is stopped or reset. 启动，它是已在运行不会更改的计时器状态或重置的运行时间属性。Starting a that is already running does not change the timer state or reset the elapsed time properties. 当实例测量多个时间间隔，方法恢复测量与当前的运行时间值的时间。When a instance measures more than one interval, the method resumes measuring time from the current elapsed time value. A实例计算，并跨多个时间间隔，保留的累积的运行时间，直到重置实例。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset. 使用方法之前调用清除中的累计已用时间实例。Use the method before calling to clear the cumulative elapsed time in a instance. 使用方法和使用单个命令。Use the method to and the with a single command. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来启动一个计时器，测量应用程序的执行时间。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to start a timer that measures the execution time of an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Shared Function StartNew () As Stopwatch

summary.span: 对新的 实例进行初始化，将运行时间属性设置为零，然后开始测量运行时间。

span.span: Initializes a new instance, sets the elapsed time property to zero, and starts measuring elapsed time.

returns.span: 刚刚开始测量运行时间的 。

span.span: A that has just begun measuring elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于调用构造函数，然后再调用上的新实例。This method is equivalent to calling the constructor and then calling on the new instance. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类，用于测量的性能的四个不同实现的分析从字符串的整数。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 停止测量某个时间间隔的运行时间。

span.span: Stops measuring elapsed time for an interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型方案中，调用方法，然后最终调用方法，然后检查正在使用的运行时间属性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 方法结束当前的时间间隔测量。The method ends the current time interval measurement. 停止即未运行不会更改的计时器状态或重置的运行时间属性。Stopping a that is not running does not change the timer state or reset the elapsed time properties. 当实例测量多个时间间隔，方法相当于暂停经过的时间度量。When a instance measures more than one interval, the method is equivalent to pausing the elapsed time measurement. 后续调用恢复测量与当前的运行时间值的时间。A subsequent call to resumes measuring time from the current elapsed time value. 使用方法来清除中的累计已用时间实例。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in a instance. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来停止测量应用程序的执行时间的计时器。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to stop a timer that measures the execution time of an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]
